entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near plus 5. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Wednesday 12 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers early this evening. Clearing near midnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Wednesday 12 April 2023
